stsjorbsmod:EyeOfTheStorm.NAME: Eye of the Storm
stsjorbsmod:EyeOfTheStorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory, then remember a random memory you do not have stsjorbsmod:Clarity of. NL Gain !B! Block.

stsjorbsmod:ForbiddenGrimoire.NAME: Forbidden Grimoire
stsjorbsmod:ForbiddenGrimoire.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Entombed until turn 7. NL Choose 1 of 3 stsjorbsmod:Material_Components. NL Exhaust, then stsjorbsmod:Exhume after playing !M! other cards, unless stsjorbsmod:Snapped.

stsjorbsmod:BlackTentacles.NAME: Black Tentacles
stsjorbsmod:BlackTentacles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Attacks with random targets target this enemy for !M! turn.
stsjorbsmod:BlackTentacles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Attacks with random targets target this enemy for !M! turn. NL Draw !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! card.

stsjorbsmod:ArcaneWeapon.NAME: Arcane Weapon
stsjorbsmod:ArcaneWeapon.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, attack a random enemy for !D! damage.

stsjorbsmod:Firebolt.NAME: Firebolt
stsjorbsmod:Firebolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! stsjorbsmod:Burning for each stsjorbsmod:Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:MagicMissiles.NAME: Magic Missiles
stsjorbsmod:MagicMissiles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage again once for each stsjorbsmod:Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:SnakeOil.NAME: Snake Oil
stsjorbsmod:SnakeOil.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Deals !M! additional damage per stsjorbsmod:Coil. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:TrueStrike.NAME: True Strike
stsjorbsmod:TrueStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This damage cannot be prevented or reduced.

stsjorbsmod:RayOfFrost.NAME: Ray of Frost
stsjorbsmod:RayOfFrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! times.

stsjorbsmod:Counterspell.NAME: Counterspell
stsjorbsmod:Counterspell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact if an enemy intends to apply a negative effect. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:DisguiseSelf.NAME: Disguise Self
stsjorbsmod:DisguiseSelf.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

stsjorbsmod:DoubleCheck.NAME: Double-check
stsjorbsmod:DoubleCheck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Diligence. NL At the start of your next turn, if you remember stsjorbsmod:Diligence gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:Channel.NAME: Channel
stsjorbsmod:Channel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! [E] next turn.
stsjorbsmod:Channel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! [E] next turn. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

stsjorbsmod:ChainLightning.NAME: Chain Lightning
stsjorbsmod:ChainLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Chain to ALL enemies, gaining !M! damage per chain.

stsjorbsmod:WanderingMind.NAME: Wandering Mind
stsjorbsmod:WanderingMind.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Remember a random memory you do not have stsjorbsmod:Clarity of.

stsjorbsmod:WeightOfMemory.NAME: Weight of Memory
stsjorbsmod:WeightOfMemory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL cards which "remember".

stsjorbsmod:Prestidigitation.NAME: Prestidigitation
stsjorbsmod:Prestidigitation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, apply !M! Weak or !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

stsjorbsmod:Message.NAME: Message
stsjorbsmod:Message.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Message.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Index.NAME: Index
stsjorbsmod:Index.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then put !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! cards from your hand on top of your draw pile in random order.
stsjorbsmod:Index.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then put !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

stsjorbsmod:FocusedMind.NAME: Focused Mind
stsjorbsmod:FocusedMind.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Sin: Deal !D! damage. NL stsjorbsmod:Virtue: Gain !B! Block. NL stsjorbsmod:Snapped: Do both.

stsjorbsmod:UnseenServant.NAME: Unseen Servant
stsjorbsmod:UnseenServant.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Sloth. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:UnseenServant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Sloth. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Draw !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! card. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Aid.NAME: Aid
stsjorbsmod:Aid.DESCRIPTION: Heal an enemy for !M! HP. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Aid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal an enemy for !M! HP. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Mania.NAME: Mania
stsjorbsmod:Mania.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, equal to the number of unique cards in your hand. If they are all unique, gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! [E] and draw !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! card.
stsjorbsmod:Mania.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, equal to !stsjorbsmod:BaseDamage! + the number of unique cards in your hand. If they are all unique, gain !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! [E] and draw !stsjorbsmod:UrMagic! card.

stsjorbsmod:Mindworm.NAME: Mindworm
stsjorbsmod:Mindworm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If snapped, deal another !M! damage. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

stsjorbsmod:Hurt.NAME: Hurt
stsjorbsmod:Hurt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP per stsjorbsmod:Clarity you have.

stsjorbsmod:OldPocket.NAME: Old Pocket
stsjorbsmod:OldPocket.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Charity. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:OldPocket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Charity. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:TollTheDead.NAME: Toll the Dead
stsjorbsmod:TollTheDead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target had already been damaged this turn, deal !D! damage again.

stsjorbsmod:CorpseExplosion_Wanderer.NAME: Corpse Explosion
stsjorbsmod:CorpseExplosion_Wanderer.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Entombed. Ethereal. NL stsjorbsmod:Exhume whenever an enemy dies. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Wrath. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Mending.NAME: Mending
stsjorbsmod:Mending.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP for each stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Rest.NAME: Rest
stsjorbsmod:Rest.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Chastity. NL Gain !B! Block. NL End your turn.

stsjorbsmod:MistyStep.NAME: Misty Step
stsjorbsmod:MistyStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! per stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL Draw !M! card.
stsjorbsmod:MistyStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! per stsjorbsmod:Clarity + !stsjorbsmod:BaseBlock!. NL Draw !M! card.

stsjorbsmod:MageArmor.NAME: Mage Armor
stsjorbsmod:MageArmor.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the next damage taken by !M!.

stsjorbsmod:Stalwart.NAME: Stalwart
stsjorbsmod:Stalwart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Temperance. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:AnimateObjects.NAME: Animate Objects
stsjorbsmod:AnimateObjects.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each non-exhausted card that didn't start the combat in your deck.

stsjorbsmod:ColorSpray.NAME: Color Spray
stsjorbsmod:ColorSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and apply a random debuff to each. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Envy.

stsjorbsmod:TinyHut.NAME: Tiny Hut
stsjorbsmod:TinyHut.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory.
stsjorbsmod:TinyHut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory.

stsjorbsmod:FaerieFire.NAME: Faerie Fire
stsjorbsmod:FaerieFire.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Virtue: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL stsjorbsmod:Sin: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Introspection.NAME: Introspection
stsjorbsmod:Introspection.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, lose 1 HP and deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Deal !M! additional damage per stsjorbsmod:Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:BookOfTongues.NAME: Book of Tongues
stsjorbsmod:BookOfTongues.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, draw !M! random stsjorbsmod:Material_Component.
stsjorbsmod:BookOfTongues.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, draw !M! random stsjorbsmod:Material_Components.

stsjorbsmod:MagicMirror.NAME: Magic Mirror
stsjorbsmod:MagicMirror.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive a debuff, apply that debuff to ALL enemies.
stsjorbsmod:MagicMirror.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you receive a debuff, apply that debuff to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:Thorns.NAME: Thorns
stsjorbsmod:Thorns.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Humility. NL If an enemy intends to attack, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Thorns.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Humility. NL Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:RefuseToForget.NAME: Refuse to Forget
stsjorbsmod:RefuseToForget.DESCRIPTION: You cannot forget your current memory until you have stsjorbsmod:Clarity of it. NL Scry !M!.

stsjorbsmod:LocateObject.NAME: Locate Object
stsjorbsmod:LocateObject.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Greed. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:SchoolsOfMagic.NAME: Schools of Magic
stsjorbsmod:SchoolsOfMagic.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If you have no duplicate cards in hand, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity; otherwise, Exhaust 1 of each duplicate.

stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliar.NAME: Find Familiar
stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory.
stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory. NL If stsjorbsmod:Snapped, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:Trauma.NAME: Trauma
stsjorbsmod:Trauma.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Snap. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Put this card on top of your draw pile.

stsjorbsmod:GatherPower.NAME: Gather Power
stsjorbsmod:GatherPower.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL This turn, your next attack is played !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! additional time.
stsjorbsmod:GatherPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL This turn, your next attack is played !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! additional times.

stsjorbsmod:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
stsjorbsmod:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Lust. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
stsjorbsmod:Fireball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Lust. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! stsjorbsmod:Burning to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:LoseGrip.NAME: Lose Grip
stsjorbsmod:LoseGrip.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL stsjorbsmod:Exhume when you stsjorbsmod:Snap.

stsjorbsmod:HoldMonster.NAME: Hold Monster
stsjorbsmod:HoldMonster.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength until end of turn. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Withdraw.NAME: Withdraw
stsjorbsmod:Withdraw.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:MirrorImage.NAME: Mirror Image
stsjorbsmod:MirrorImage.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL The next enemy attack misses.
stsjorbsmod:MirrorImage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness. NL The next enemy attack misses. NL Retain.

stsjorbsmod:CorrodingBarrier.NAME: Corroding Barrier
stsjorbsmod:CorrodingBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gains !M! less Block this combat each time it is drawn.

stsjorbsmod:Entangle.NAME: Entangle
stsjorbsmod:Entangle.DESCRIPTION: Apply stsjorbsmod:Slow to ALL enemies. NL Add !M! stsjorbsmod:Web into your hand.
stsjorbsmod:Entangle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply stsjorbsmod:Slow to ALL enemies. NL Add !M! stsjorbsmod:Webs into your hand.

stsjorbsmod:Amnesia.NAME: Amnesia
stsjorbsmod:Amnesia.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, stsjorbsmod:Snap. NL Remove all buffs and debuffs from self.

stsjorbsmod:Fear.NAME: Fear
stsjorbsmod:Fear.DESCRIPTION: Target non-boss enemy will flee in !M! turns. If this ends combat, you gain no rewards but keep Clarities for the next combat.

stsjorbsmod:Determination.NAME: Determination
stsjorbsmod:Determination.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Pride. NL At the end of this turn, stsjorbsmod:Snap.
stsjorbsmod:Determination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Pride. NL At the end of your next turn, stsjorbsmod:Snap.

stsjorbsmod:ArcaneForm.NAME: Arcane Form
stsjorbsmod:ArcaneForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of stsjorbsmod:Wrath, stsjorbsmod:Lust, stsjorbsmod:Diligence, stsjorbsmod:Kindness, and stsjorbsmod:Chastity.

stsjorbsmod:Banish.NAME: Banish
stsjorbsmod:Banish.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes no action and no damage for !M! turns. Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Feast.NAME: Feast
stsjorbsmod:Feast.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Gluttony. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:IvoryTower.NAME: Ivory Tower
stsjorbsmod:IvoryTower.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust all Curse and Status cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:IvoryTower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust all Curse and Status cards in your hand.

stsjorbsmod:Web.NAME: Web
stsjorbsmod:Web.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Quicksilver.NAME: Quicksilver
stsjorbsmod:Quicksilver.DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Advance relics !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! turn through time. NL This turn, your next attack is played !M! additional time.
stsjorbsmod:Quicksilver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stsjorbsmod:Ephemeral. NL Advance relics !stsjorbsmod:MetaMagic! turn through time. NL This turn, your next attack is played !M! additional times.

stsjorbsmod:Stone.NAME: Stone
stsjorbsmod:Stone.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply stsjorbsmod:Slow to enemy. NL If already stsjorbsmod:Slowed, double its stsjorbsmod:Slow stacks. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:Stone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply stsjorbsmod:Slow to enemy. NL If already stsjorbsmod:Slowed, triple its stsjorbsmod:Slow stacks. NL Exhaust.
